entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued July 27 at 8:56AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY ISSUED FOR SOUTHEASTERN WISCONSIN... The Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources has issued an Air Quality Advisory for Ozone from 11 AM until 11:00 PM tonight. This advisory affects people living in the following counties: Dodge, Fond du Lac, Jefferson, Kenosha, Milwaukee, Ozaukee, Racine, Rock, Sheboygan, Walworth, Washington, Waukesha.

entry.summary: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL TUCKER COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomas, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:22PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN PRESTON COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Friendsville to 9 miles north of Kingwood. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph.
